title: TheUltraElite
author: TheUltraElite
content: Taking a bit of inspiration from other boards, I am starting this thread which should serve as a place to welcome and onboard new members in the Indian Local section of the forum.Please follow the local rules and be polite and welcoming to everyone. No racial or caste based slurs nor any political debate please - I personally hate them most.Newbies can take the following format to introduce themselves:Code:Username -Currently residing in - How did you get into cryptocurrency? - Your skills if any?Things your co-members might want to keep in mind about you - Anything else you might want to share - Feel free to edit the above list but try to keep it short and simple.  Looking forward to meeting all the new and budding members of India, lets make this local a fun and engaging community!  PS: Inputs from the rest of the forum members are welcome!PPS: Older members are also welcome to try this.PPPS: Nobody is perfect, so be nice to everyone.

comments.author: Parvati_j
comments.body: Username :   Parvati_jCurrently residing in : prefer not to say, thanksHow did you get into cryptocurrency? : got links from social media then I did a couple of research Your skills if any? : I am an electrical engineerThings your co-members might want to keep in mind about you : I can be trusted, and I'll do my best to keep that reputationAnything else you might want to share  : I want to say a very big thank you to those who have been active and have kept this local board running for years, and also to those who supported me by providing links for my learning purpose, THANKS TO YOU ALL.

comments.author: bitnote
comments.body: Username - bitnoteCurrently residing in - India How did you get into cryptocurrency? - YoutubeYour skills if any? NoThings your co-members might want to keep in mind about you - I'm willing to help anyone.Anything else you might want to share - My English is not good, I am a Male.

comments.author: M47AK16
comments.body: This is an excellent initiative to create a welcoming space for everyone. I’m looking forward to expanding my network here. It’ll be great to engage with like-minded individuals, and I’m particularly curious to see if there are others from my city who are active on this forum.QuoteUsername - M47AK16Currently residing in - Bangalore, KAHow did you get into cryptocurrency? - I've always been curious about cryptocurrencies, so I started exploring and learning from every available resource I could find.Your skills if any - Strong expertise in customer service, including exceptional communication skills and a focus on ensuring customer satisfaction. Things your co-members might want to keep in mind about you - I’m always open to conversations and keen to learn something new every day. I also run a small-scale BPO in Bangalore and am currently exploring opportunities to expand it globally.Anything else you might want to share - We should consider organizing community engagement events such as games, to keep our local board active and interactive. I’ll brainstorm a few ideas and share them soon.

comments.author: Krishna1942
comments.body: Username :   krishnaCurrently residing in : hyderabad How did you get into cryptocurrency? :  in searching of online income opportunitiesYour skills if any? :  making memesThings your co-members might want to keep in mind about you : I want to become established member of this forum, I am genuine, if any help for your projects I will doAnything else you might want to share : I want to say thank you to all Indian members, let's grow together, spread this bitcoin world to all your friends, let's go to new highs along with bitcoin. Practice meditation.

comments.author: allahabadi
comments.body: Quote from: Krishna1942 on November 23, 2024, 03:28:47 AMUsername :   krishnaCurrently residing in : hyderabad How did you get into cryptocurrency? :  in searching of online income opportunitiesYour skills if any? :  making memesThings your co-members might want to keep in mind about you : I want to become established member of this forum, I am genuine, if any help for your projects I will doAnything else you might want to share : I want to say thank you to all Indian members, let's grow together, spread this bitcoin world to all your friends, let's go to new highs along with bitcoin. Practice meditation. Drop some memes that u feel are good.
